name: confoundedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express anger or to emphasize what you are saying: How could you be so confoundedly stupid? I have been confoundedly busy with work all this month.
More examplesFewer examplesIf only she weren't so confoundedly pleased with herself all the time!She thought that he was a confoundedly odd sort of person.It's confoundedly annoying to have to change my plans at the last minute.You are so confoundedly talkative that nobody else can ever get a word in.
